column1: Little Goat Diner////I blame the subpar food and really slow service to 2nd day of opening.  It took about 45 mins to get our food and it all came out at once
column2: really wish my salad was brought out before my main entree.  I had the fried chicken which was over fried and over salted/seasoned.  The mac and cheese was really disappointing
column3: kind of oily and seemed like it had been sitting around for a while and reheated.  My caesar was not fresh
column4: overdressed and again had been sitting around dressed.  The croutons were a let-down.  Friends had some breakfast items which they felt were just okay
